page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content:
In our area {Blantyre/Bothwell}we found that just over 50% of the people own cars. These were not concentrated in a single area and fairly evenly spread. Somewhat surprisingly less than 1% own motorcycles, and over 40% own bicycles.
In{Blantyre}there is a train and taxi station, and several bus services form a network across the entire area. The majority of people use public transport quite regularly and the bus seems to be the most popular. Most people find public transport in general too expensive. Judging from most peoples responses, bus services in our area are the most reliable form of transport.
